bookBuilder.title: Ukungenisa kwe-BookBuilder

upload.title: Layisha Amadokhumenti Akho
upload.dragDrop: Hudula bese ushiya ifayela lakho le-ZIP lapha

classification.title: Buyekeza Ukuhlukaniswa Kwamadokhumenti
classification.subtitle: Hudulela izingxenye phakathi kwezigaba ukuze uhlele isakhiwo sencwadi yakho
classification.frontMatterDesc: Ikhasi lesihloko, ilungelo lokushicilela, ukuzinikela, isandulelo, ithebula lokuqukethwe
classification.backMatterDesc: Isiphetho, isiphetho, isithasiselo, uhlu lwamagama, inkomba, izinkomba

messages.importTip: üìù Iseluleko Sokungenisa: Uma amadokhumenti akho e-Word aqukethe okuqukethwe okuxubile (izihloko, ithebula lokuqukethwe, ulwazi lombhali, njll.), i-BookBuilder ingase yakhe izingxenye ezengeziwe. Ngemva kokungenisa, ungasusa kalula izingxenye ongazifuni futhi ususe okuqukethwe phakathi kwe-Front Matter, Main Matter, ne-Back Matter njengoba kudingeka.
messages.systemPages: Ikhasi Lesihloko ne-Copyright kuyakhiwa ngokuzenzakalela - noma yiliphi ikhasi lesihloko/copyright elingenisiwe liyeqiwe.

validation.noFile: Sicela ukhethe ifayela le-ZIP ukuze ulilayishe.
validation.fileTooLarge: Ifayela likhulu kakhulu. Usayizi omkhulu kakhulu ngu-50MB.
validation.processingFailed: Kuhlulekile ukucubungula amadokhumenti. Sicela uhlole ifomethi yefayela.

bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Hudulela izingxenye ukuze uzihlelele kabusha ngaphakathi kwezigaba noma sebenzisa i-dropdown ethi "SUSA" ukuze ushintshe izingxenye phakathi kwe-Front/Main/Back Matter
